Workspace collection for all the geeks, programmers and designers. These workspaces redefine the meaning of productivity. Lots of macbook, iMac, iPad and iPhones. Multiple monitors, a cup of coffee on the desk, great gadgets (aimchair, keyboard, headphone, speakerâ€¦). They may not have good room, but they got the best digital devices.
